programming.title: Skyrmion Racetrace Memory on B+ Tree Simulator
programming.description: Simulate the behaviors on B+ tree indexing scheme of the advanced memory material, skyrmion racetrack memory, and collect the memory operations to analyze the energy consumption and latency with different algorithms.

programming.title: Verilog Simulation Optimization via Instruction Reduction
programming.description: Reduce code size of verilog files and keep the input and output logic with same logic effect.

programming.title: Dynamic Neural Networks on Energy Harvesting Devices
programming.description: The programming project for the thesis experiment. We implement the dynamic neural networks on the TI MSP430FR5994 evaluation board with SRAM and FRAM, and we design a circuit to simulate an energy harvesting environment.This project includes training a neural network, converting TensorFlow model to quantized model to fit on the MCU, and implementing dynamic neural network and hybrid strategy on the MCU.
